Built with Alectryon, running Coq+SerAPI v8.13.0+0.13.0. Bubbles () indicate interactive fragments: hover for details, tap to reveal contents. Use Ctrl+â†‘ Ctrl+â†“ to navigate, Ctrl+ğŸ–±ï¸ to focus. On Mac, use âŒ˜ instead of Ctrl.
From stdpp Require Import prelude finite.
From Coq Require Import FunctionalExtensionality.
From VLSM.Lib Require Import Preamble StdppListSet FinFunExtras ListExtras.
From VLSM Require Import Core.VLSM Core.MessageDependencies Core.VLSMProjections Core.Composition Core.ProjectionTraces Core.SubProjectionTraces Core.ByzantineTraces.
From VLSM Require Import Core.Validator Core.Equivocation Core.EquivocationProjections Core.Equivocation.NoEquivocation Core.Equivocation.FixedSetEquivocation.

VLSM Compositions with a fixed set of byzantine nodes

In this module we study a composition in which a fixed subset of nodes are replaced by byzantine nodes, i.e., nodes which can send arbitrary channel_authenticated_messages at any time, while the rest are protocol abiding (non-equivocating) nodes.
We will show that, if the non-byzantine nodes are validators for the composition with that specific fixed-set of nodes as equivocators, then the projections of traces to the non-byzantine nodes are precisely the projections of traces of the composition with that specific fixed-set of nodes as equivocators to the non-equivocating nodes.
That is, non-byzantine validator nodes do not distinguish between byzantine nodes and equivocating ones. Therefore, when analyzing the security of a protocol it suffices to consider equivocating nodes. 
Section emit_any_signed_message_vlsm.

A machine which can emit any valid message for a given node

This VLSM is similar to the emit_any_message_vlsm with the exception of the validity predicate which requires that the sender of the emitted message corresponds to the given node. 
Context
  {message : Type}
  {index : Type}
  {validator : Type}
  (A : validator -> index)
  (sender : message -> option validator)
  (node_idx : index)
  .
The validity predicate allows sending only signed messages 
Definition signed_messages_valid
  (l : @label message all_messages_type)
  (som : @state message all_messages_type * option message)
  : Prop :=
  channel_authenticated_message A sender node_idx l.

Definition emit_any_signed_message_vlsm_machine
  : VLSMMachine all_messages_type
  :=
  {| initial_state_prop := fun s => True
   ; initial_message_prop := fun m => False
   ; s0 := all_messages_state_inh
   ; transition := all_messages_transition
   ; valid := signed_messages_valid
  |}.

Definition emit_any_signed_message_vlsm
    := mk_vlsm emit_any_signed_message_vlsm_machine.

End emit_any_signed_message_vlsm.

Section fixed_byzantine_traces.

Context
  {message : Type}
  `{finite.Finite index}
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  `{forall i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)}
  (byzantine : set index)
  {validator : Type}
  (A : validator -> index)
  (sender : message -> option validator)
  (no_initial_messages_in_IM : no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop IM)
  (can_emit_signed : channel_authentication_prop IM A sender)
  (Hsender_safety : sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender :=
    channel_authentication_sender_safety IM A sender can_emit_signed)
  .
Given a collection of nodes indexed by an index, we define the associated fixed byzantine collection of nodes by replacing the nodes corresponding to the indices in a given byzantine with byzantine nodes, i.e., nodes which can emit any (signed) message. 
Definition fixed_byzantine_IM : index -> VLSM message :=
  update_IM IM byzantine (fun i => emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender (` i)).

  IM

  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
âˆ€ (i : index) (m : message),
  Â¬ vinitial_message_prop (fixed_byzantine_IM i) m

âˆ€ (i : index) (m : message),
  Â¬ vinitial_message_prop
      match decide (i âˆˆ byzantine) with
      | left i_in =>
          emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender
            (`(dexist i i_in))
      | right _ => IM i
      end m

Ht: all_messages_transition l (s0, om) = (s1, Some m)
H3: () = s1
H4: l = m
channel_authenticated_message A sender i m

    subst; assumption.

Qed.

Definition fixed_byzantine_IM_sender_safety
  : sender_safety_alt_prop fixed_byzantine_IM A sender :=
  channel_authentication_sender_safety fixed_byzantine_IM A sender
    fixed_byzantine_IM_preserves_channel_authentication.

Hi: i âˆˆ byzantine
vlabel
  match decide (i âˆˆ byzantine) with
  | left i_in =>
      emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender
        (`(dexist i i_in))
  | right _ => IM i
  end

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
m: message
i: index
Hi: i âˆˆ byzantine
vlabel
  (if decide (i âˆˆ byzantine)
   then emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender i
   else IM i)

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type

  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
m: message
i: index
Hi: i âˆˆ byzantine
message
 exact m.
Defined.

Context
  (non_byzantine : set index := set_diff (enum index) byzantine)
  .
Constraint requiring only that the non-byzantine nodes are not equivocating. 
Definition non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint
  : composite_label fixed_byzantine_IM -> composite_state fixed_byzantine_IM * option message -> Prop :=
  sub_IM_not_equivocating_constraint fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine A sender.
The first definition of the fixed_byzantine_trace_property:
Fixed byzantine traces are projections to the subset of protocol-following nodes of traces which are valid for the composition in which a fixed set of nodes were replaced by byzantine nodes and the rest are protocol-following (i.e., they are not equivocating). 
Definition fixed_byzantine_trace_prop
  (is : composite_state (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
  (tr : list (composite_transition_item (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)))
  : Prop :=
  exists bis btr,
  finite_valid_trace (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint) bis btr /\
  composite_state_sub_projection fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine bis = is /\
  finite_trace_sub_projection fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine btr = tr.

Byzantine traces characterization as projections.

Section fixed_byzantine_traces_as_projections.

Definition fixed_non_byzantine_projection : VLSM message :=
  induced_sub_projection fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint.

âˆ€ s : state,
  vinitial_state_prop fixed_non_byzantine_projection s
  â†” composite_initial_state_prop
      (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine) s

Qed.

     (free_composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)))

  (projection_induced_vlsm_machine
     (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
        non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
     (composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
     (composite_label_sub_projection_option

     (free_composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)))

     (composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
     (composite_label_sub_projection_option
        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (composite_state_sub_projection
        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
     (free_composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)))
 intros s H1; apply fixed_non_byzantine_projection_initial_state_preservation; assumption.

           fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)

           non_byzantine)

           non_byzantine)

  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine) (id l)
  (id s, om)

  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type

      projection_induced_vlsm_machine
        (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM

           fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)

           non_byzantine)

           non_byzantine)

          (free_composite_vlsm
             (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
    |} (id l) (id s, om) = (id s', om')

    (* an ugly trick to get the forward direction from an iff (<->) lemma *)
    eapply proj1; rapply @induced_sub_projection_transition_preservation.
Qed.
The induced projection from the composition of fixed_byzantine_IM under the non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint to the non-byzantine nodes has the projection_friendly_property.

  IM

  sender

  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender

projection_friendly_prop
  (induced_sub_projection_is_projection
     fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
     non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
s1, s2: composite_state fixed_byzantine_IM
Heq: composite_state_sub_projection
  fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine s1 =
composite_state_sub_projection
  fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine s2
l: composite_label fixed_byzantine_IM
m: message
match option_map A (sender m) with
| Some i =>
    match decide (i âˆˆ non_byzantine) with
    | left non_byzantine_i =>
        has_been_sent
          (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
             (dexist i non_byzantine_i)) (s1 i) m
    | right _ => True
    end
| None => True
end
â†’ match option_map A (sender m) with
  | Some i =>
      match decide (i âˆˆ non_byzantine) with
      | left non_byzantine_i =>
          has_been_sent
            (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
               (dexist i non_byzantine_i)) (s2 i) m
      | right _ => True
      end
  | None => True
  end

  fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine s2

| Some i =>
    match decide (i âˆˆ non_byzantine) with
    | left non_byzantine_i =>
        has_been_sent
          (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
             (dexist i non_byzantine_i)) (s1 i) m
    | right _ => True
    end
| None => True
end
â†’ match option_map A (Some v) with
  | Some i =>
      match decide (i âˆˆ non_byzantine) with
      | left non_byzantine_i =>
          has_been_sent
            (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
               (dexist i non_byzantine_i)) (s2 i) m
      | right _ => True
      end
  | None => True

sender: message â†’ option validator

  IM

  sender

  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
s1, s2: composite_state fixed_byzantine_IM
Heq: composite_state_sub_projection
  fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine s1 =
composite_state_sub_projection
  fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine s2
l: composite_label fixed_byzantine_IM
m: message
v: validator
match decide (A v âˆˆ non_byzantine) with
| left non_byzantine_i =>
    has_been_sent
      (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
         (dexist (A v) non_byzantine_i)) (s1 (A v)) m
| right _ => True
end
â†’ match decide (A v âˆˆ non_byzantine) with
  | left non_byzantine_i =>
      has_been_sent
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
           (dexist (A v) non_byzantine_i)) (s2 (A v))
        m
  | right _ => True
  end

  
message, index: Type

IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type

sender: message â†’ option validator

  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
s1, s2: composite_state fixed_byzantine_IM
Heq: composite_state_sub_projection
  fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine s1 =
composite_state_sub_projection
  fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine s2
l: composite_label fixed_byzantine_IM
m: message
v: validator
HAv: A v âˆˆ non_byzantine
has_been_sent
  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
     (dexist (A v) HAv)) (s1 (A v)) m
â†’ has_been_sent
    (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
       (dexist (A v) HAv)) (s2 (A v)) m

  
message, index: Type

composite_state_sub_projection
  fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine s2
l: composite_label fixed_byzantine_IM
m: message
v: validator
HAv: A v âˆˆ non_byzantine
s1 (A v) = s2 (A v)

  exact (equal_f_dep Heq (dexist (A v) HAv)).
Qed.
Characterization result for the first definition: the fixed_byzantine_trace_property is equivalent to the finite_valid_trace_property of the induced_sub_projection of the the composition in which a fixed set of nodes were replaced by byzantine nodes and the rest are protocol-following to the set of protocol-following nodes.

  (composite_transition_item
     (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))

    tr

projection_friendly_prop
  (induced_sub_projection_is_projection
     fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
     non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)

  apply fixed_non_byzantine_projection_friendliness.
Qed.

End fixed_byzantine_traces_as_projections.

Fixed Byzantine traces as traces pre-loaded with signed messages

In this section we'll be showing that byzantine traces correspond to traces of the composition of nodes in the non_byzantine, preloaded with messages signed by the nodes in the byzantine. 
Section fixed_byzantine_traces_as_pre_loaded.

Definition fixed_set_signed_message (m : message) : Prop :=
  non_sub_index_authenticated_message non_byzantine A sender m /\
  (exists i, i âˆˆ non_byzantine /\ exists l s, input_valid (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) l (s, Some m)).
Given that we're only looking at the composition of nodes in the non_byzantine, we can define their subset as either a subset of the fixed_byzantine_IM or of the original IM.
As it turns out, the first definition is easier to prove equivalent to the induced fixed_non_byzantine_projection, while the second is easier to work with in general because it makes no reference to byzantine nodes.
Therefore we'll first be defining them both below and show that they are equivalent to each-other using the generic Lemma same_IM_full_projection. 
Definition pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm' : VLSM message :=
  composite_no_equivocation_vlsm_with_pre_loaded (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine) (free_constraint _) fixed_set_signed_message.

Definition pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm : VLSM message :=
  composite_no_equivocation_vlsm_with_pre_loaded (sub_IM IM non_byzantine) (free_constraint _) fixed_set_signed_message.

Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
âˆ€ sub_i : sub_index non_byzantine,
  sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine sub_i =
  sub_IM IM non_byzantine sub_i

| left i_in =>
    emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender
      (`(dexist (`(dexist i Hi)) i_in))
| right _ => IM (`(dexist i Hi))
end = IM (`(dexist i Hi))

        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)))
  s1

  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)

  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
  fixed_set_signed_message l1 
  (s1, om)

  (sub_IM IM non_byzantine)
  (free_constraint (sub_IM IM non_byzantine))
  fixed_set_signed_message
  (same_IM_label_rew non_byzantine_nodes_same l1)
  (same_IM_state_rew non_byzantine_nodes_same s1, om)

H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)

  IM

  sender

  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender

s1: state
Hs1: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)))
  s1
l1: composite_label
  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
om: option message
Hom: composite_no_equivocations_except_from
  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
  fixed_set_signed_message l1 
  (s1, om)
composite_no_equivocations_except_from
  (sub_IM IM non_byzantine) fixed_set_signed_message
  (same_IM_label_rew non_byzantine_nodes_same l1)
  (same_IM_state_rew non_byzantine_nodes_same s1, om)

We next show that the fixed_non_byzantine_projection and pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm' are VLSM_equal.
The validity of fixed_non_byzantine_projection subsumes the constraint of pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm'.

can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
l: label
s: state
m: message
i: index
Hi: i âˆˆ non_byzantine
li: label
si: state
Hv: input_valid
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (fixed_byzantine_IM i)) li 
  (si, Some m)
Hseeded: non_sub_index_authenticated_message
  non_byzantine A sender m
i âˆˆ non_byzantine
âˆ§ (âˆƒ (l : label) (s : state),
     input_valid
       (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) l
       (s, Some m))

âˆ€ (li : label) (si : state),
  input_valid
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       match decide (i âˆˆ byzantine) with
       | left i_in =>
           emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender
             (`(dexist i i_in))
       | right _ => IM i
       end) li (si, Some m)
  â†’ âˆƒ (l : label) (s : state),
      input_valid
        (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) l
        (s, Some m)

        then emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender i
        else IM i)) si

          then emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender i
          else IM i)) (Some m)

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index

  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
strong_incl_initial_state_preservation
  (projection_induced_vlsm_machine
     (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
        non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
     (composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
     (composite_label_sub_projection_option
        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (composite_state_sub_projection
        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                    non_byzantine))
              fixed_set_signed_message)))
     fixed_set_signed_message)

     (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
        non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)

        non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
l: label
s: state
m: message
Hs: valid_state_prop
  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine);
    vmachine :=
      projection_induced_vlsm_machine
        (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
        (composite_type
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
              non_byzantine))
        (composite_label_sub_projection_option
           fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
        (composite_state_sub_projection
           fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
        (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine)
        (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine)
  |} s
Hv: valid l (s, Some m)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine);
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           (composite_vlsm
              (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                 non_byzantine)
              (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
                 (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                    non_byzantine)
                 (free_constraint
                    (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                      non_byzantine))
                 fixed_set_signed_message)))
        fixed_set_signed_message
  |} (id s)
valid_message_prop
  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine);
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           (composite_vlsm
              (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
              (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
                 (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                    non_byzantine)
                 (free_constraint
                    (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                       non_byzantine))
                 fixed_set_signed_message)))
        fixed_set_signed_message
  |} m

  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine);
    vmachine :=
      projection_induced_vlsm_machine
        (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
        (composite_type
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
              non_byzantine))
        (composite_label_sub_projection_option
           fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
        (composite_state_sub_projection
           fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
        (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine)
        (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine)
  |} s

  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
  (s, Some m).1 m

  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine);

      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages

message, index: Type

  IM

  sender

  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
weak_incl_transition_preservation
  (projection_induced_vlsm_machine
     (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
        non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
     (composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
     (composite_label_sub_projection_option
        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (composite_state_sub_projection
        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)

                 (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                    non_byzantine))
              fixed_set_signed_message)))

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
l: label
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
Ht: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
vtransition
  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine);
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           (composite_vlsm
              (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
              (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
                 (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                    non_byzantine)
                 (free_constraint
                    (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                       non_byzantine))
                 fixed_set_signed_message)))
        fixed_set_signed_message
  |} (id l) (id s, om) = (id s', om')

    apply induced_sub_projection_transition_preservation in Ht; assumption.
Qed.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
weak_full_projection_valid_preservation
  pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm'
  (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
     non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
  (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
  (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
weak_full_projection_valid_preservation
  pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm'
  (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
     non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
  (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
  (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator

  IM

  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
sub_i: sub_index non_byzantine
li: vlabel
  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine sub_i)
s: state
om: option message
HsX: valid_state_prop
  pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm' s
HomX: option_valid_message_prop
  pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm' om
Hv: composite_valid
  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
  (existT sub_i li) (s, om)
Hc: composite_no_equivocations_except_from
  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
  fixed_set_signed_message 
  (existT sub_i li) (s, om)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
     non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
  (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM
     non_byzantine s)
HomY: option_valid_message_prop
  (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
     non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
  om

     non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
  (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
     (existT sub_i li))
  (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine s,
  om)

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
i: index
Hi: sub_index_prop non_byzantine i
li: vlabel
  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
     (dexist i Hi))
s: state
m: message
HsX: valid_state_prop
  pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm' s
Hc: composite_no_equivocations_except_from
  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
  fixed_set_signed_message
  (existT (dexist i Hi) li) 
  (s, Some m)
match option_map A (sender m) with
| Some i =>
    match decide (i âˆˆ non_byzantine) with
    | left non_byzantine_i =>
        has_been_sent
          (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
             (dexist i non_byzantine_i))
          (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM
             non_byzantine s i) m
    | right _ => True
    end
| None => True
end

  sender

  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender

i: index

li: vlabel
  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
     (dexist i Hi))
s: state
m: message
HsX: valid_state_prop
  pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm' s
Hc: composite_no_equivocations_except_from
  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
  fixed_set_signed_message
  (existT (dexist i Hi) li) 
  (s, Some m)
v: validator
Hsender: sender m = Some v
match decide (A v âˆˆ non_byzantine) with
| left non_byzantine_i =>
    has_been_sent
      (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
         (dexist (A v) non_byzantine_i))
      (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
         s (A v)) m
| right _ => True
end

  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine
     (dexist i Hi))
s: state
m: message

  pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm' s

  (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine) s
  m
v: validator
Hsender: sender m = Some v

has_been_sent

     (dexist (A v) HAv)) (s (dexist (A v) HAv)) m

  sender

  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index

can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender

     non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
  (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM
     non_byzantine s)

Hgen: valid (message_as_byzantine_label m i Hi)
  (s0, None)
â†’ âˆ€ (s' : state) (om' : option message),
    transition
      (message_as_byzantine_label m i Hi)
      (s0, None) = (s', om')
    â†’ valid_state_message_prop X s' om'
vvalid

  | left i_in =>
      emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender
        (`(dexist i i_in))
  | right _ => IM i
  end
  (eq_rect_r (Î» v : VLSM message, vlabel v) m
     (decide_True
        (emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender i)
        (IM i) Hi))
  (`(vs0
       match decide (i âˆˆ byzantine) with
       | left i_in =>
           emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender
             (`(dexist i i_in))
       | right _ => IM i
       end), None)

   then emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender i

        (IM i) Hi))

        then emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender i
        else IM i)), None)

      rewrite @decide_True; assumption.

  i âˆˆ non_byzantine
  âˆ§ (âˆƒ (l : label) (s : state),
       input_valid
         (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
            (IM i)) l (s, Some m))
X:= composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
  non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint: VLSM message
s0:= `(composite_s0 fixed_byzantine_IM): composite_state fixed_byzantine_IM
Hs0: valid_state_message_prop X s0 None
si': state
_om: option message
Ht: vtransition (fixed_byzantine_IM i)
  (eq_rect_r (Î» v : VLSM message, vlabel v) m
     (decide_True
        (emit_any_signed_message_vlsm A sender i)
        (IM i) Hi))
  (`(vs0 (fixed_byzantine_IM i)), None) =
(si', _om)
Hgen: valid_state_message_prop X
  (state_update fixed_byzantine_IM
     (Î» n : index,
        `(vs0 (fixed_byzantine_IM n))) i si')
  _om
Some m = _om

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
m: message
i: index
Hi: i âˆˆ byzantine
_om: option message
âˆ€ si' : (), ((), Some m) = (si', _om) â†’ Some m = _om

    inversion 1; intuition.
Qed.
Since the fixed_non_byzantine_projection is an induced_projection of the composition of fixed_byzantine_IM with a non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint, its initial_messages and validity are derived from valid messages and protocol validity of the larger composition; therefore, the following simple result becomes very important. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
VLSM_full_projection
  pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm'
  (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
     non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
  (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
  (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)

     (composite_state_sub_projection
        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
 intro; intros; apply fixed_non_byzantine_projection_initial_state_preservation; assumption.
  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator

  IM

  sender

  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
weak_incl_initial_message_preservation
  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                    non_byzantine))
              fixed_set_signed_message)))
     fixed_set_signed_message)
  (projection_induced_vlsm_machine
     (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
        non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
     (composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
     (composite_label_sub_projection_option
        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (composite_state_sub_projection
        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
     (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))

  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)

              (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)

                    non_byzantine))

     fixed_set_signed_message)

        non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)

  {|
    vtype :=
      vtype
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
              non_byzantine)
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                 non_byzantine)
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                    non_byzantine))

      projection_induced_vlsm_machine
        (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
        (composite_type
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
              non_byzantine))
        (composite_label_sub_projection_option
           fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
        (composite_state_sub_projection
           fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
        (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine)

           non_byzantine)

weak_incl_transition_preservation
  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                    non_byzantine))
              fixed_set_signed_message)))
     fixed_set_signed_message)

     (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
        non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
     (composite_type
        (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))

        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)

        fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)

     (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
byzantine: set index
validator: Type

sender: message â†’ option validator
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
non_byzantine:= set_diff (enum index) byzantine: set index
l: label
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
Ht: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
vtransition
  {|
    vtype :=
      vtype
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                    non_byzantine))
              fixed_set_signed_message));
    vmachine :=
      projection_induced_vlsm_machine
        (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
        (composite_type
           (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
        (composite_label_sub_projection_option
           fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
        (composite_state_sub_projection
           fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
        (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine)
        (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM
           non_byzantine)
  |} (id l) (id s, om) = (id s', om')

transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
â†’ vtransition
    {|
      vtype :=
        vtype
          (composite_vlsm
             (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
             (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
                (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                   non_byzantine)
                (free_constraint
                   (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                      non_byzantine))
                fixed_set_signed_message));
      vmachine :=
        projection_induced_vlsm_machine
          (composite_vlsm fixed_byzantine_IM
             non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint)
          (composite_type
             (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine))
          (composite_label_sub_projection_option
             fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
          (composite_state_sub_projection
             fixed_byzantine_IM non_byzantine)
          (lift_sub_label fixed_byzantine_IM
             non_byzantine)
          (lift_sub_state fixed_byzantine_IM
             non_byzantine)
    |} (id l) (id s, om) = (id s', om')

    apply @induced_sub_projection_transition_preservation.
Qed.

                 (free_constraint
                    (sub_IM fixed_byzantine_IM
                       non_byzantine))
                 fixed_set_signed_message)))
        fixed_set_signed_message
  |}

End fixed_byzantine_traces_as_pre_loaded.
The second fixed byzantine trace definition.
Given the equivalence results from Lemmas fixed_byzantine_trace_char1, fixed_non_byzantine_pre_loaded_eq, and pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm_full_projection, we introduce the following alternate definition to the fixed_byzantine_trace_property, this time defined for (not necessarily valid) traces of the full composition, accepting any such trace as long as its projection to the non-byzantine nodes is indistinguishable from a projection of a valid trace of the composition of fixed_byzantine_IM under the non_byzantine_not_equivocating_constraint. 
Definition fixed_byzantine_trace_alt_prop is tr : Prop :=
  finite_valid_trace pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
    (composite_state_sub_projection IM non_byzantine is)
    (finite_trace_sub_projection IM non_byzantine tr).

End fixed_byzantine_traces.

Relation between Byzantine nodes and equivocators

In this section we show that while equivocators can always appear as byzantine to the protocol-abiding nodes, the converse is also true if the protocol- abiding nodes satisfy the projection_message_validator_property, which basically allows them to locally verify the authenticity of a received message. 
Section fixed_non_equivocating_vs_byzantine.

Context
  {message : Type}
  `{finite.Finite index}
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  `{forall i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)}
  `{forall i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)}
  (selection : set index)
  {validator : Type}
  (A : validator -> index)
  (sender : message -> option validator)
  (selection_complement := set_diff (enum index) selection)
  (PreNonByzantine : VLSM message := pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm IM selection A sender)
  (Fixed : VLSM message := fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM selection)
  (FixedNonEquivocating : VLSM message := induced_sub_projection IM selection_complement (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  (no_initial_messages_in_IM : no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop IM)
  (can_emit_signed : channel_authentication_prop IM A sender)
  (Hsender_safety : sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender :=
    channel_authentication_sender_safety IM A sender can_emit_signed)
  .


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
VLSM_incl FixedNonEquivocating
  (induced_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     (sub_IM_not_equivocating_constraint IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection) A sender))

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)

selection: set index
validator: Type

  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
l: composite_label IM
s: composite_state IM
om: option message
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  s
Hom: option_valid_message_prop
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  om
Hv: composite_valid IM l (s, om)
Hc: fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection l
  (s, om)
Hstrong_v: strong_fixed_equivocation_constraint IM
  selection l (s, om)
sub_IM_not_equivocating_constraint IM
  (set_diff (enum index) selection) A sender l (s, om)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
l: composite_label IM
s: composite_state IM
m: message
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  s
Hom: option_valid_message_prop
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  (Some m)
Hv: composite_valid IM l (s, Some m)
Hc: fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection l
  (s, Some m)
Hstrong_v: strong_fixed_equivocation_constraint IM
  selection l (s, Some m)
sub_IM_not_equivocating_constraint IM
  (set_diff (enum index) selection) A sender l
  (s, Some m)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
l: composite_label IM
s: composite_state IM
m: message
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  s
Hom: option_valid_message_prop
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  (Some m)
Hv: composite_valid IM l (s, Some m)
Hc: fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection l
  (s, Some m)
Hstrong_v: strong_fixed_equivocation_constraint IM
  selection l (s, Some m)
v: validator
Hsender: sender m = Some v
match
  decide (A v âˆˆ set_diff (enum index) selection)
with
| left non_byzantine_i =>
    has_been_sent
      (sub_IM IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
         (dexist (A v) non_byzantine_i)) (s (A v)) m
| right _ => True
end

has_been_sent
  (sub_IM IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     (dexist (A v) HAv)) (s (A v)) m

     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  (Some m)
Hv: composite_valid IM l (s, Some m)
Hc: fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection l
  (s, Some m)
i: index
Hi: i âˆ‰ selection
Hsent: has_been_sent (IM i) (s i) m
v: validator
Hsender: sender m = Some v
HAv: A v âˆ‰ selection
Hpre_si: âˆ€ i : index,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (IM i)) (s i)
has_been_sent (IM (A v)) (s (A v)) m
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
l: composite_label IM
s: composite_state IM
m: message
Hs: valid_state_prop
  {|
    vtype := vtype (free_composite_vlsm IM);
    vmachine :=
      machine
        (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
           (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  |} s
Hom: option_valid_message_prop
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  (Some m)
Hv: composite_valid IM l (s, Some m)
Hc: fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection l
  (s, Some m)
Hemitted: can_emit
  (equivocators_composition_for_sent IM
     selection s) m
v: validator
Hsender: sender m = Some v
HAv: A v âˆ‰ selection

    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (IM i)) (s i)

strong_incl_initial_state_preservation
  (projection_induced_vlsm_machine
     (composite_vlsm IM
        (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
     (composite_type (sub_IM IM selection_complement))
     (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
        selection_complement)
     (composite_state_sub_projection IM
        selection_complement)
     (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
     (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement))
  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM IM
              (set_diff (enum index) selection))
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff (enum index) selection))
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
              (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
                 sender))))
     (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A sender))

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator

  IM selection A sender: VLSM message

  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message

  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
sX: vstate
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
Hinitial: vinitial_state_prop
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM
        selection)) sX
sub_i: sub_index (set_diff (enum index) selection)
vinitial_state_prop
  (sub_IM IM (set_diff (enum index) selection) sub_i)
  (id
     (composite_state_sub_projection IM
        selection_complement sX) sub_i)

    apply Hinitial.
  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

                 sender))))
     (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A sender))
 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message

  IM

  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
l: label
s: state
m: message
Hv: input_valid
  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type
        (sub_IM IM selection_complement);
    vmachine :=
      projection_induced_vlsm_machine
        (composite_vlsm IM
           (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM
              selection))
        (composite_type
           (sub_IM IM selection_complement))
        (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
           selection_complement)
        (composite_state_sub_projection IM
           selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement)
  |} l (s, Some m)

  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type
        (sub_IM IM selection_complement);
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           (composite_vlsm
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff 
                    (enum index) selection))
              (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff 
                      (enum index) selection))
                 (free_constraint
                    (sub_IM IM
                      (set_diff 
                      (enum index) selection)))
                 (fixed_set_signed_message IM
                    selection A sender))))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
           sender)
  |} (id s)

  |} m

EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message

  IM

  sender

m: message

  {|
    vtype := vtype FixedNonEquivocating;
    vmachine :=
      machine
        (induced_sub_projection IM
           (set_diff (enum index) selection)
           (sub_IM_not_equivocating_constraint IM
              (set_diff (enum index) selection) A
              sender))
  |} s

  (set_diff (enum index) selection) A sender
  m

  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type
        (sub_IM IM selection_complement);

              (sub_IM IM

                      (enum index) selection))

                      (set_diff 
                      (enum index) selection)))

     (composite_vlsm IM

  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender

s: state
om: option message

  {|
    vtype :=
      composite_type (sub_IM IM selection_complement);
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           (composite_vlsm
              (sub_IM IM

              (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded

                    (set_diff (enum index) selection))
                 (free_constraint
                    (sub_IM IM
                       (set_diff (enum index)
                          selection)))
                 (fixed_set_signed_message IM
                    selection A sender))))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
           sender)
  |} (id s)

IM: index â†’ VLSM message

H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator

     IM selection): VLSM message

                      (enum index) selection))
                 (free_constraint
                    (sub_IM IM
                      (set_diff 
                      (enum index) selection)))
                 (fixed_set_signed_message IM
                    selection A sender))))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection
           A sender)
  |} om

weak_incl_transition_preservation
  (projection_induced_vlsm_machine
     (composite_vlsm IM
        (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
     (composite_type (sub_IM IM selection_complement))
     (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
        selection_complement)
     (composite_state_sub_projection IM
        selection_complement)
     (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
     (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement))
  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM IM
              (set_diff (enum index) selection))
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff (enum index) selection))
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff (enum index) selection)))

                 sender))))
     (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A sender))

transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
â†’ vtransition
    {|
      vtype :=
        composite_type
          (sub_IM IM selection_complement);
      vmachine :=
        VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
          (vmachine
             (composite_vlsm
                (sub_IM IM
                   (set_diff (enum index) selection))
                (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
                   (sub_IM IM
                      (set_diff (enum index) selection))

                            selection)))

             sender)
    |} (id l) (id s, om) = (id s', om')

    apply @induced_sub_projection_transition_preservation.
Qed.
As a corollary to the above result, we can conclude that valid traces for the composition with Fixed equivocation have the fixed_byzantine_trace_alt_property. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
is: state
tr: list transition_item
finite_valid_trace Fixed is tr
â†’ fixed_byzantine_trace_alt_prop IM selection A sender
    is tr

can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace Fixed is tr
fixed_byzantine_trace_alt_prop IM selection A sender
  is tr

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace Fixed is tr
finite_valid_trace
  {|
    vtype := vtype FixedNonEquivocating;
    vmachine := machine FixedNonEquivocating
  |}
  (composite_state_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) is)
  (finite_trace_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) tr)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index

  IM selection A sender: VLSM message

  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
is: state
tr: list transition_item
Htr: finite_valid_trace Fixed is tr
Hproj: VLSM_projection
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM
        selection))
  (induced_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM
        selection))
  (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection))
  (composite_state_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection))
finite_valid_trace
  {|
    vtype := vtype FixedNonEquivocating;
    vmachine := machine FixedNonEquivocating
  |}
  (composite_state_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) is)
  (finite_trace_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) tr)

  apply (VLSM_projection_finite_valid_trace Hproj); assumption.
Qed.

Section validator_fixed_set_byzantine.

Context
  (message_dependencies : message -> set message)
  `{forall i, MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)}
  (Hfull : forall i, message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop message_dependencies (IM i))
  .


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index

H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)

  (lift_sub_state IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) s)
HomY: option_valid_message_prop Fixed (Some m)
fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection
  (lift_sub_label IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     l)
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     s, Some m)

    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
message_dependencies: message â†’ set message
H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
l: label
s: state
m: message
Hv: input_valid PreNonByzantine l (s, Some m)
Hsent: composite_has_been_sent
  (sub_IM IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))
  (s, Some m).1 m
HsY: valid_state_prop Fixed
  (lift_sub_state IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) s)
HomY: option_valid_message_prop Fixed (Some m)
fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection
  (lift_sub_label IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     l)
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     s, Some m)

  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
message_dependencies: message â†’ set message
H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
l: label
s: state
m: message
Hv: input_valid PreNonByzantine l (s, Some m)
i: index
Hi: i âˆ‰ set_diff (enum index) selection
Hsigned: channel_authenticated_message A sender i m
HsY: valid_state_prop Fixed
  (lift_sub_state IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) s)
_v: index
Hiom: can_emit
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM _v)) m
can_emit
  (equivocators_composition_for_observed IM selection
     (lift_sub_state IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection) s)) m

      
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator

  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message

  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
message_dependencies: message â†’ set message
H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
l: label
s: state
m: message
Hv: composite_valid
  (sub_IM IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)) l
  (s, Some m)
i: index
Hi: i âˆˆ selection
v: validator
Hsender: sender m = Some v
Hsigned: A v = i
HsY: valid_state_prop Fixed
  (lift_sub_state IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) s)
dm: message
Hdm: dm âˆˆ message_dependencies m
composite_has_been_observed IM
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     s) dm

     (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     (Î» n : index, `(vs0 (IM n))) s j) dm

      rewrite lift_sub_state_to_eq with (Hi0 := Hj); assumption.
Qed.


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message

    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
VLSM_full_projection PreNonByzantine
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  (lift_sub_label IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))

     (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  (lift_sub_label IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
message_dependencies: message â†’ set message
H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
strong_full_projection_initial_state_preservation
  PreNonByzantine
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM))
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))

Qed.

Section assuming_initial_messages_lift.

Context
  (Hfixed_non_byzantine_vlsm_lift_initial_message
    : weak_full_projection_initial_message_preservation PreNonByzantine Fixed
    (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))).
Since FixedNonEquivocating is an induced_projection of Fixed, its initial_messages and validity are derived from valid messages and protocol validity of the larger composition; therefore, the following result becomes very important. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
message_dependencies: message â†’ set message
H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
Hfixed_non_byzantine_vlsm_lift_initial_message: weak_full_projection_initial_message_preservation
  PreNonByzantine
  Fixed
  (lift_sub_state
     IM
     (set_diff
        (enum
        index)
        selection))
VLSM_full_projection PreNonByzantine Fixed
  (lift_sub_label IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))

  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
Hfixed_non_byzantine_vlsm_lift_initial_message: weak_full_projection_initial_message_preservation
  PreNonByzantine
  Fixed
  (lift_sub_state
     IM
     (set_diff
        (enum
        index)
        selection))
weak_full_projection_transition_preservation
  PreNonByzantine Fixed
  (lift_sub_label IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))
 intro; intros * []; rapply lift_sub_transition; assumption.
  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message

  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message

  IM

  sender

    (IM i)

strong_incl_initial_state_preservation
  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM IM
              (set_diff (enum index) selection))
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff (enum index) selection))
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
              (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
                 sender))))
     (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A sender))

     (composite_vlsm IM
        (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
     (composite_type (sub_IM IM selection_complement))
     (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
        selection_complement)
     (composite_state_sub_projection IM
        selection_complement)
     (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
     (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement))

H3: vinitial_state_prop
  {|
    vtype :=
      vtype
        (composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (free_constraint
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender)));

      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (free_constraint
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender))))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender)
  |} s
vinitial_state_prop
  {|
    vtype :=
      vtype
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM IM
              (set_diff (enum index) selection))
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff (enum index) selection))
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
              (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
                 sender)));

      projection_induced_vlsm_machine
        (composite_vlsm IM
           (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
        (composite_type
           (sub_IM IM selection_complement))
        (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
           selection_complement)
        (composite_state_sub_projection IM
           selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement)
  |} (id s)

    vtype :=
      vtype
        (composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM IM

        (sub_IM IM

        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection)))

        sender))))

        sender)
  |} s
composite_state_sub_projection IM selection_complement
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     s) = id s
âˆ§ vinitial_state_prop
    (composite_vlsm IM
       (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
    (lift_sub_state IM
       (set_diff (enum index) selection) s)

    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
message_dependencies: message â†’ set message
H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
Hfixed_non_byzantine_vlsm_lift_initial_message: weak_full_projection_initial_message_preservation
  PreNonByzantine
  Fixed
  (lift_sub_state
     IM
     (set_diff
        (enum
        index)
        selection))
s: state
H3: vinitial_state_prop
  {|
    vtype :=
      vtype
        (composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (free_constraint
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender)));

      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (free_constraint
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender))))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender)
  |} s

  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     s) = id s
