weak_incl_initial_message_preservation
  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM IM
              (set_diff (enum index) selection))
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff (enum index) selection))
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
              (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
                 sender))))
     (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A sender))
  (projection_induced_vlsm_machine
     (composite_vlsm IM
        (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
     (composite_type (sub_IM IM selection_complement))
     (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
        selection_complement)
     (composite_state_sub_projection IM
        selection_complement)
     (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
     (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement))

        (composite_label_sub_projection_option
        IM selection_complement)
        (composite_state_sub_projection IM
        selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement)
  |} (id s)
HmX: vinitial_message_prop
  {|
    vtype :=
      vtype
        (composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (free_constraint
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender)));
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (free_constraint
        (sub_IM IM
        (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender))))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender)
  |} m
input_valid PreNonByzantine ?l (?s, Some m)

VLSM_full_projection
  {|
    vtype :=
      vtype
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM IM
              (set_diff (enum index) selection))
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff (enum index) selection))
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
              (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
                 sender)));
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           (composite_vlsm
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff (enum index) selection))
              (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff (enum index) selection))
                 (free_constraint
                    (sub_IM IM
                       (set_diff (enum index)
                          selection)))
                 (fixed_set_signed_message IM
                    selection A sender))))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
           sender)
  |} Fixed ?label_project
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))

    apply fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm_lift_from_initial.
  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender

H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,

    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)

     IM

        (enum

        selection))
weak_incl_valid_preservation
  (VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
     (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM IM
              (set_diff (enum index) selection))
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff (enum index) selection))
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
              (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
                 sender))))
     (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A sender))

     (composite_vlsm IM
        (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
     (composite_type (sub_IM IM selection_complement))
     (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
        selection_complement)
     (composite_state_sub_projection IM
        selection_complement)
     (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
     (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement))

input_valid
  (composite_vlsm IM
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  (lift_sub_label IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     l)
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     s, om)

        index)

l: label
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
Ht: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
vtransition
  {|
    vtype :=
      vtype
        (composite_vlsm
           (sub_IM IM
              (set_diff (enum index) selection))
           (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff (enum index) selection))
              (free_constraint
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
              (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
                 sender)));
    vmachine :=
      projection_induced_vlsm_machine
        (composite_vlsm IM
           (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
        (composite_type
           (sub_IM IM selection_complement))
        (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
           selection_complement)
        (composite_state_sub_projection IM
           selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement)
  |} (id l) (id s, om) = (id s', om')

    apply induced_sub_projection_transition_preservation; assumption.
Qed.

        (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
        (composite_type
        (sub_IM IM selection_complement))
        (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
        selection_complement)
        (composite_state_sub_projection IM
        selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement)
  |}
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreNonByzantine;
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
        (composite_vlsm
        (sub_IM IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
        (sub_IM IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))
        (free_constraint
        (sub_IM IM (set_diff (enum index) selection)))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender))))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
        sender)
  |}

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender

H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
Hfixed_non_byzantine_vlsm_lift_initial_message: weak_full_projection_initial_message_preservation
  PreNonByzantine
  Fixed
  (lift_sub_state
     IM
     (set_diff
        (enum
        index)
        selection))
VLSM_incl
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreNonByzantine;
    vmachine :=
      VLSMMachine_pre_loaded_with_messages
        (vmachine
           (composite_vlsm
              (sub_IM IM
                 (set_diff (enum index) selection))
              (no_equivocations_additional_constraint_with_pre_loaded
                 (sub_IM IM
                    (set_diff (enum index) selection))
                 (free_constraint
                    (sub_IM IM
                       (set_diff (enum index)
                          selection)))
                 (fixed_set_signed_message IM
                    selection A sender))))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
           sender)
  |}
  {|
    vtype := vtype PreNonByzantine;
    vmachine :=
      projection_induced_vlsm_machine
        (composite_vlsm IM
           (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
        (composite_type
           (sub_IM IM selection_complement))
        (composite_label_sub_projection_option IM
           selection_complement)
        (composite_state_sub_projection IM
           selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_label IM selection_complement)
        (lift_sub_state IM selection_complement)
  |}
 apply fixed_non_byzantine_incl_fixed_non_equivocating_from_initial.

                    selection A sender))))
        (fixed_set_signed_message IM selection A
           sender)
  |}
 apply fixed_non_equivocating_incl_fixed_non_byzantine.
Qed.

End assuming_initial_messages_lift.

Context
  (Hvalidator:
    forall i : index, i âˆ‰ selection ->
    component_message_validator_prop IM (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection) i)
  .

Hi: sub_index_prop (set_diff (enum index) selection)
  i
Him: initial_message_prop m
valid_message_prop Fixed m
 
message, index: Type

IM: index â†’ VLSM message

     IM selection): VLSM message

  IM

  sender

    (IM i)

valid_message_prop Fixed m

    eapply Hvalidator; eassumption.
Qed.
The VLSM corresponding to the induced projection from a fixed-set byzantine composition to the non-byzantine components is trace-equivalent to the VLSM corresponding to the induced projection from the composition of regular nodes under a fixed-set equivocation constraint to the same components. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator

PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message

  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message

  IM

  sender

    (IM i)

VLSM_eq PreNonByzantine FixedNonEquivocating

         selection) i
weak_full_projection_initial_message_preservation
  PreNonByzantine Fixed
  (lift_sub_state IM (set_diff (enum index) selection))

  apply validator_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm_lift_initial_message.
Qed.

The main result

Assuming that the non-byzantine nodes are validators for the fixed_equivocation_constraint we give the following characterization of traces with the fixed_byzantine_trace_alt_property in terms of equivocation:
A trace has the fixed_byzantine_trace_alt_property for a selection of byzantine nodes iff there exists a valid trace for the Fixed equivocation composition the projections of the two traces to the non-byzantine nodes, i.e., the nodes in the selection_complement coincide. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
message_dependencies: message â†’ set message
H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
Hvalidator: âˆ€ i : index,
  i âˆ‰ selection
  â†’ component_message_validator_prop IM
      (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM
         selection) i
bis: composite_state IM
btr: list (composite_transition_item IM)
fixed_byzantine_trace_alt_prop IM selection A sender
  bis btr
â†” (âˆƒ (eis : state) (etr : list transition_item),
     finite_valid_trace Fixed eis etr
     âˆ§ composite_state_sub_projection IM
         selection_complement eis =
       composite_state_sub_projection IM
         selection_complement bis
       âˆ§ finite_trace_sub_projection IM
           selection_complement etr =
         finite_trace_sub_projection IM
           selection_complement btr)

     finite_valid_trace Fixed eis etr
     âˆ§ composite_state_sub_projection IM
         selection_complement eis =
       composite_state_sub_projection IM
         selection_complement bis
       âˆ§ finite_trace_sub_projection IM

         finite_trace_sub_projection IM
           selection_complement btr)

  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
message_dependencies: message â†’ set message
H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
Hvalidator: âˆ€ i : index,
  i âˆ‰ selection
  â†’ component_message_validator_prop IM
      (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM
         selection) i
bis: composite_state IM
btr: list (composite_transition_item IM)
Htr: finite_valid_trace
  (pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm IM
     selection A sender)
  (composite_state_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) bis)
  (finite_trace_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) btr)
âˆƒ (eis : state) (etr : list transition_item),
  finite_valid_trace Fixed eis etr
  âˆ§ composite_state_sub_projection IM
      selection_complement eis =
    composite_state_sub_projection IM
      selection_complement bis
    âˆ§ finite_trace_sub_projection IM
        selection_complement etr =
      finite_trace_sub_projection IM
        selection_complement btr
 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
IM: index â†’ VLSM message
H0: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenSentCapability (IM i)
H1: âˆ€ i : index, HasBeenReceivedCapability (IM i)
selection: set index
validator: Type
A: validator â†’ index
sender: message â†’ option validator
selection_complement:= set_diff (enum index) selection: set index
PreNonByzantine:= pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm
  IM selection A sender: VLSM message
Fixed:= fixed_equivocation_vlsm_composition IM
  selection: VLSM message
FixedNonEquivocating:= induced_sub_projection IM
  selection_complement
  (fixed_equivocation_constraint
     IM selection): VLSM message
no_initial_messages_in_IM: no_initial_messages_in_IM_prop
  IM
can_emit_signed: channel_authentication_prop IM A
  sender
Hsender_safety:= channel_authentication_sender_safety
  IM A sender can_emit_signed: sender_safety_alt_prop IM A sender
message_dependencies: message â†’ set message
H2: âˆ€ i : index,
  MessageDependencies message_dependencies (IM i)
Hfull: âˆ€ i : index,
  message_dependencies_full_node_condition_prop
    message_dependencies 
    (IM i)
Hvalidator: âˆ€ i : index,
  i âˆ‰ selection
  â†’ component_message_validator_prop IM
      (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM
         selection) i
bis: composite_state IM
btr: list (composite_transition_item IM)
Htr: finite_valid_trace
  (pre_loaded_fixed_non_byzantine_vlsm IM
     selection A sender)
  (composite_state_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) bis)
  (finite_trace_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection) btr)
finite_valid_trace
  (induced_sub_projection IM
     (set_diff (enum index) selection)
     (fixed_equivocation_constraint IM selection))
  (composite_state_sub_projection IM
     selection_complement bis)
  (finite_trace_sub_projection IM selection_complement
     btr)
